channel.title: Bagus Faisal Khafidz
channel.description: Recent content on Bagus Faisal Khafidz

item.title: Simple Email Service With Sendgrid Api And Spring Boot
item.description: Kali ini saya akan berbagi bagaimana caranya membuat email service dengan sendgrid Api. Bahasa pemrograman yang digunakan kali ini yaitu Java dengan framework backend Spring boot. Cerita singkatnya begini spring boot akan mengirimkan sebuah request email ke sendgrid, dan sendgrid akan mengirimkan/ meneruskan ke email target. Kamu harus mempunyai Api key dari sendgrid, api key ini yang akan digunakan untuk mengirimkan request email ke sendgrid. Jika belum punya registrasi terlebih dahulu di https://app.

item.title: Pycon Conference 2019
item.description: Some time ago I attended the 2019 pycon conference in Surabaya, East Java. Pycon is an annual event held by the Indonesian python programming language community (python id). The interesting thing at the Pycon conference is the event that contains python programming material, such as learning machines, big data, and others. In addition to the pycon conference held in Indonesia, there were also some foreign developers including India, Japan, the Philippines, and Europe.

item.title: Pengalaman 1 Tahun Bekerja Sebagai Software Engineer
item.description: Sebelum saya menuliskan pengalaman 1 tahun bekerja sebagai software engineer, sebelumnya mohon maaf apabila tulisan saya ini jelek, sudah lama tidak menulis artikel. Oke mulai ya, saat kuliah saya mengambil jurusan Teknik Informatika di Kampus Universitas Ahmad dahlan di Yogyakarta. Saat masuk perkuliahan saya sedikit kaget karena perkuliahan semua membahas ke programming, karena saat SMA saya di IPA sedikit pengalaman di dunia TI. Singkatnya saya lulus 4th tepat dengan gelar S.

item.title: Install Personal Blog With Hugo In Windows
item.description: Download Hugo application https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases Create Directory Hugo In data system C: like C:\Hugo\bin. Extract hugo file that was previously downloaded. Cek version with command prompt hugo version. Create a new site, hugo new site new-site. Add a theme open diretory new-site cd new-site. git init git submodule add https://github.com/budparr/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke Note for non-git users: If you do not have git installed, you can download the archive of the latest version of this theme from: https://github.

item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a backend developer. I likes coffee, games, and learn about something new. Thanks for reading!
